import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import FetchSingleMovieDetails from '../../hooks/detailMovie' import WatchSvg from '../../components/icons/watch' import CloseMovieSvg from '../../components/icons/closeMovie' const WatchMovie=({movieId}:{movieId:any})=>{ const { data:movie, isLoading,isError:errorMessage } = FetchSingleMovieDetails(movieId) return ( <>

{movie && movie.title}

HD

{movie && movie.vote_average}

{movie && movie.vote_average}

{movie && movie.release_date}

{movie && movie.overview}

Country: {movie && movie.production_companies[0].origin_country}

Country: {movie && movie.genres[0].name}

Scores: {movie && movie.vote_average}

) } export default WatchMovie
